modes.label: Caution mode
modes.description: Wallet-only posture preferred; avoid releases and public marketing without review.

modes.label: Restricted mode
modes.description: No privacy-asset service work; no release keys; escalate.

permission_matrix.RED: No privacy-asset work. No release/keys. Escalate.
permission_matrix.AMBER: R&D ok if non-custodial. No marketing. Legal review.

permission_matrix.RED: Restricted mode. Pause privacy tasks. Avoid demos.
permission_matrix.AMBER: Ok with caution. Avoid releases. Non-sensitive work.

implementation_controls: Repo segmentation: privacy modules behind separate access group.
Release controls: app store submission and signing keys only from GREEN (or pre-cleared AMBER) locations.
Distribution/GTM: geo-fence privacy-asset services in RED; treat AMBER as wallet-only unless counsel approves.
Travel mode: enable restricted mode and revoke sensitive access while in RED zones.
